Package Model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Entity
    Each instance in the game is an entity even an empty space, bullet (projectile), robots
    EntityActionSequence
    Represent each of the action a robot can have Observable - Observe if there is a change in action sequence, if there is then update all subscribers(view)
    EntitySystem
    Control the logic and flow of the game Observable - If there is a change in logic, call all the observers that subscribes to it
    Projectile
    Projectile entity in game
    Robot
    Robot entity in game
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EntityActionSequence.Action  
    EntityType
    Each type of entity in the board
